work.name: Apprvd.co
work.summary: Rich text editor for specially legal docx that connected to ai.
responsibilities: Migrated the platform's rich text editing framework from Plate.js to TinyMCE, improving editing performance and compatibility with advanced legal formatting needs.
Integrated a commenting feature within the TinyMCE editor to allow users and reviewers to leave contextual feedback directly on AI-generated content, streamlining the document review workflow.
Designed and implemented structured document templates to standardize legal document generation, enabling users to create consistent and professional outputs with minimal manual effort.
achievements: Successfully migrated and optimized the rich text editor platform, resulting in improved performance and enhanced legal document formatting capabilities.
Implemented an innovative commenting system within the editor that streamlined document review processes and improved team collaboration efficiency.
Developed standardized document templates that reduced manual effort by 40% and ensured consistent, professional output across all legal documents.

Contributed to marketing efforts that reached millions of end-users, supporting large-scale product advertisement campaigns for clients.
Worked in agile sprint cycles of 7â€“14 days per project, ensuring rapid delivery and iteration based on stakeholder feedback and user testing.

work.name: PT Tri Venterium Digital
work.summary: Build marketplace for electric bike accessories.
responsibilities: Developed the company's marketplace, reducing dependency on public platforms and cutting service fees by 15%.
Built the storefront for customers, enabling shopping cart management, transactions, and checkout, handling hundreds of orders per month.
Implemented a real-time transaction status tracking feature, reducing customer inquiries by 70%.
Contributed to the admin dashboard, streamlining transactions and payment management.
Developed a bookkeeping feature, improving financial tracking and reducing manual errors by 80%.
achievements: Improving financial tracking and reducing manual errors by 80%.
Make some feature to decrease human error possibilities.
